t:
She said she couldn't sleep at night,
I realized she wanted to share her plight.

She said she'd be on the balcony,
I realized she wanted to meet me.

She said her hair was getting too long,
I realized she wanted my caress,
                                     gentle yet strong.
c:
She said she was afraid of thunder,
I realized she wanted me to hug her.

She said she didn't like science,
I realized she wanted to read stories of romance.

She said her hands were cold,
I realized she wanted mine to hold.

She said she wanted to go to the beach,
I realized she wanted me within reach.

She said the sky was cloudy,
I realized she was sad and moody.

She said green was her favorite color,
I realized she wanted to heal and recover.

She said she no longer liked my demands,
I realized she wanted freedom in new hands.

She said she was breaking up with me,
I realized she was going away, free.

I finally realized everything,
Was I wise, somehow?
Too late, she belonged to someone else now.

We met after a long time,
She asked me, “How are you?”
I realized, she wasn't happy too.



#realization #regret #loss #relationship #emotions #heartbreak #love #perspective
